SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Device
The Device class represents a smart home device with various attributes such as device name, type, group, location, power status, battery level, and power consumption.
DeviceGroup
The DeviceGroup class represents a group of smart home devices.
DeviceLocation
The DeviceLocation class represents a location within a smart home that contains multiple devices.
DeviceType
The DeviceType class represents a type of smart home devices.
EmptyListAccessException
 
LinkedList<T>
A linked list implementation.
LogTask
 
Main
 
PriorityQueue<T>
A generic priority queue implementation using an ArrayList.
Rule
The Rule class represents a set of actions to be performed on smart home devices.
SmartHome
 
Task<T>
Represents a task with an associated priority.
